whatIsAssetAnalysisDiagram: What is the {assetSymbol} symbol analysis chart?
whatIsAssetAnalysisDiagramInfo: What does stock chart analysis show?
whatIsAssetAnalysisDiagramDescription: Talano collects all analyst messages from social networks such as Telegram channels, Rahavard and Sahamyab websites, and based on AI algorithms identifies the number of buy and sell signals for each stock, and finally shows the summary of social network analysts' opinions in the form of this chart.
whatIsAssetAnalysisDiagramTitle2: How does this chart's needle determine stock buy and sell timing?
whatIsAssetAnalysisDiagramDescription2: If the chart needle points to buy, it means from the analysts' perspective it's time to buy this stock, and if it points to sell, it means you should consider selling and taking profit. If the needle is in the neutral zone, the stock is volatile and it's not the right time to buy or sell yet.
faqQuestion1: What does stock chart analysis show?
faqAnswer1: Talano collects all analyst messages from social networks such as Telegram channels, Rahavard and Sahamyab websites, and based on AI algorithms identifies the number of buy and sell signals for each stock, and finally shows the summary of social network analysts' opinions in the form of this chart.
faqQuestion2: How does this chart's needle determine stock buy and sell timing?
faqAnswer2: If the chart needle points to buy, it means from the analysts' perspective it's time to buy this stock, and if it points to sell, it means you should consider selling and taking profit. If the needle is in the neutral zone, the stock is volatile and it's not the right time to buy or sell yet.

n1.title: What is Talano and what does it do?
n1.text: Talano analyzes signals from 34,000 stock and cryptocurrency traders every day and introduces you to the top traders in financial markets so you can follow them and have more profitable trades using these people's analysis!

n2.title: How can I find top traders with the highest rank?
n2.text: Top traders are listed on the relevant page and you can see each trader's rank next to them. Also, if you search for your trader's name on Talano, you can enter that person's dedicated page and see that trader's track record with all details.

n3.title: How are Talano featured symbols generated?
n3.text: Top traders are listed on the relevant page and featured symbols are suggested based on the summary of top traders' signals. These are symbols that top-ranked individuals have issued the most buy signals for in recent days.

n4.title: Is there a fee to use Talano?
n4.text: Part of Talano's services is free for all users. But if you want to use the featured symbols section or want to be informed in time of top traders' latest decisions about your stocks, you need to have Talano subscription.

n5.title: How can I test Talano product before purchasing subscription?
n5.text: Talano has provided a free gift plan for all users so you can test the product before purchasing and if our product is valuable to you, proceed with purchase.

n6.title: How do I receive the gift plan?
n6.text: No extra work is needed to use Talano gift subscription. To use Talano gift, just register on Talano website and we'll activate the Talano gift for you right away.

n7.title: Is there a difference between bronze, silver and gold plans?
n7.text: All Talano plans are similar in terms of features and their only difference is in usage duration. Of course, we've considered special discounts for those who purchase silver and gold plans!

n8.title: Can I cancel my membership whenever I want?
n8.text: There's no option to cancel membership in Talano mid-plan. But you can change your plan up or down for your future purchases.

n9.title: Can I use a discount code to join Talano?
n9.text: We do have discount codes. If you'd like to use a discount code, contact our support to get a discount code. Just enter the discount code you received from us or anywhere else in the relevant section and

n10.title: How do we know when it's time to sell or buy a stock?
n10.text: There's usually no exact time to buy and sell a stock. But on the featured symbols page, we try to introduce symbols that top traders are paying attention to so you can select them. We also inform you of stock status changes from buy to sell according to top traders' signals. Note that if you've received suitable profit (for example above 20 percent) from a stock, it's better to cash out part of it.

n11.title: Can I trust Talano signals?
n11.text: Talano generates its signals using algorithms based on collective intelligence and we ourselves use these signals for buying and selling. For more confidence, you can follow Talano signals for a while and after ensuring performance, proceed with buying and selling based on them. It should be noted that these signals are only analysis and the consequences of buying and selling and decisions are your own responsibility.

n12.title: Does Talano give buy or sell alerts?
n12.text: On each stock's page, there's an option to activate the alert system. If you activate the alert system for each stock, you can receive Talano alerts for buying and selling.

trader.text: Be instantly aware of traders' buy and sell signals.

text.name: Talano
text.first: 1- Ranks social media traders like Telegram, Rahavard, TradingView, etc. and introduces you to the best stock and cryptocurrency market traders.
text.second: 2- Instantly notifies you of the best stocks and cryptocurrencies that top traders recommend.

n2.title: What is the featured symbols page?
n2.text: On the featured symbols page, you can see the best stock and cryptocurrency symbols recommended by top financial market traders.

n3.title: If I subscribe, what features will be activated for me?

text.first: 1- Unlimited access to featured symbols page
text.second: 2- Access to top traders page and full view of traders' signals
text.third: 3- Create custom watchlist and receive instant alerts from followed symbols and traders

n4.title: What does Talano NOT do?
n4.text: Talano has no responsibility for signals that traders give and only collects traders' opinions and doesn't provide additional analysis itself.
